snippet: McDonald’s is cutting about 225 corporate jobs as part of a push intended to revitalize its flagging business.
abstract: McDonald's will cut roughly 225 corporate jobs as it moves to revitalize flagging business; company has targeted $300 million in cost cuts by 2017.
lead_paragraph: McDonald’s is cutting about 225 corporate jobs as part of a push intended to revitalize its flagging business.

headline.main: McDonald’s Cuts Jobs in Corporate Operations
headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s Cuts Jobs in Corporate Operations
